text: but the Constitution should have a fixed
mean Neal Gorsuch president Trump's pick
for the Supreme Court is considered a
constitutional originalist this approach
would inform the way judge gore such a
conservative makes decisions on the
Supreme Court but what is an originalist
an originalist tries to interpret the
Constitution in light of its original
meaning and from the perspective of the
people who drafted and adopted it it's
not what we wish it's what the law was
understood to mean it has a fixed
meaning as Madison said others view the
Constitution is a living document open
to interpretation through a modern lens
originalism was championed by Justice
Antonin Scalia whose seat judge Gorsuch
hopes to fill the originalist has easy
answers for many things to understand a
mindset from an earlier era an
originalist can turn to historical legal
briefs and books this philosophy can be
controversial if we were to dogmatically
adhere to originalist interpretations
then we would still have segregated
schools and bans on interracial marriage
originalism isn't necessarily partisan
the judge Gorsuch has interpreted it to
make rulings that tend to sit well with
politicians on the rights he sided with
employers who have religious objections
to the funding of birth control in their
workers insurance he wrote a book
against legalizing assisted suicide he's
also called for limiting the power of
federal regulators but he gets points on
the left for ruling against certain
types of searches by police if judge
Gorsuch is confirmed he and Justice
Clarence Thomas will be the two
originalist
on the court
[Music]
Oh
